issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Support date_trunc function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11055](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11055). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support date_trunc SQL function to truncate timestamps into the desired granularity similar to Postgres and other major SQL databases. For example
```java

SELECT date_trunc(timestamp, 'day') as day, count(*) FROM orders GROUP BY day
```
